TopicTitle: Switch Between Spacecraft When Very Close

Articles.Content: I'm having a problem switching between my aircraft that are 80m from each other. I want to swap to the other spacecraft, but when I click on it in the map view, the "Switch To" dialog bounces around the orbit and is nearly impossible to click. Is there another way to do this? I've tried it through the Space Center as well with the same results.
Try using the [ and ] keys when close.
I suppose it helps to look through the control list. Thanks for the help.
